name: CloseToTheSun
description:
In 'CloseToTheSun' you will have to survive as much as possible without being destroyed.

Controls: mouse buttons and movement.

Available languages: English, Spanish, and Euskara.

'CloseToTheSun' was firstly released for Android devices in 2021. For this web version, several changes had been made, including a score leaderboard.

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment or a message to me explaining what happened.
